rows.label: tlk79000006_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I sense that His Majesty is
not quite himself of late.

rows.label: tlk79000006_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I cannot blame him, considering
the terrible events to which
he has borne witness...

rows.label: tlk79000006_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Though he tries not to show
it, I have come to understand
the workings of his heart.
